answers.text:
Tyler, Barron County addressed this issue recently and determined that Supervisors will be reimbursed for expenses just as if they were an employee and at the same rates.  So effectively what we did is make the employee reimbursement policy effective to Supervisors.

author: Tyler Burkart
text:
The City of Janesville is receiving some interest from our elected officials to look into the possibility of drafting a reimbursement policy for city council members. I was curious if any municipalities would be willing to share their policies with the City of Janesville, which includes a list of the specific items that the city can reimburse elected officials for. 
Please email your responses to burkartt@ci.janesville.wi.us. Thank you for your help.
title: City Council Reimbursement Policy
